name: WorkStream – Smart Project & Team Management Platform (NEXT.JS)
description:
**WorkStream** is a **Smart Project & Team Management Platform** that helps teams plan, organize, and track projects efficiently.
It combines **task management, real-time collaboration, analytics, and communication tools** — all in one platform.
purpose: To enhance productivity, accountability, and collaboration in modern, project-based work environments.
challenges: Challenges have been my best teachers in development. Whether it’s fixing tricky bugs, meeting tight deadlines, or ensuring responsive design across all devices, each obstacle has sharpened my problem-solving skills. Every hurdle has made me more adaptable and confident in delivering quality work.
